wikipedia_page.main: Wilfred Harold Kerton Baker (6 January 1920 – 9 November 2000) was a British Conservative Party politician. He was Member of Parliament for Banffshire from 1964 to 1974, when he lost his seat in the February election of that year to Hamish Watt of the Scottish National Party.
